metadata.description: Spells that gather information through images, illusions, and sensory perception

spells.name: Discern the Images of Truth and Falsehood
spells.description: Allows the caster to see through illusions and magical disguises, revealing the true appearance of things and people.

spells.name: Posing the Silent Question
spells.description: Allows the caster to see events that occurred in a location within the past day, witnessing them as ghostly images overlaying the present.

spells.name: The Inexorable Search
spells.description: Shows the caster an image of a specific person or object through an arcane connection, revealing their current appearance and immediate surroundings.

spells.name: Eyes of the Past
spells.description: Allows the caster to witness events that occurred in a location up to a year ago, seeing them as if watching a play performed by translucent actors.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (see distant past), +0 Personal, +1 Concentration, +3 Vision

spells.name: Discern the Motivations
spells.description: Reveals a person's current emotional state and basic motivations through visible auras and subtle visual cues that only the caster can see.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (read emotions visually), +1 Eye, +1 Concentration, +1 Mentem requisite

spells.name: Sight of the Transparent Motive
spells.description: Allows the caster to see if someone is attempting to hide their true appearance through mundane means like makeup, disguises, or costumes.

spells.name: Wizard's Sidelong Glance
spells.description: Allows the caster to see around corners and through small openings by bending light and images to reveal hidden areas.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (see around obstacles), +0 Personal, +2 Sun, +3 Vision

spells.name: Hear the Distant Voice
spells.description: Allows the caster to hear sounds at a distant location through an arcane connection, eavesdropping on conversations or detecting activity.

spells.name: Summoning the Distant Image
spells.description: Creates a visual window showing events at a distant location in real-time, as if looking through a magical mirror or crystal ball.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create scrying window), +4 Arcane Connection, +1 Concentration, +3 Vision

spells.name: Revealed Flaws of Mortal Sight
spells.description: Corrects all flaws in the caster's vision, granting perfect eyesight and the ability to see fine details at any distance within normal sight range.

spells.name: Enchantment of Echoing Footsteps
spells.description: Allows the caster to hear and see the 'echoes' of people who have passed through an area recently, showing their paths as faint trails.
